entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7Â°C

Observed at: Earlton Airport 4:07 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
